definitions.definition: a serious disease caused by a virus, that causes a high temperature, severe pains and weakness
definitions.labels: (British English)(British English, informal)(especially North American English, informal)(British English)(informal)(British English)(North American English)(British English)(British English)(British English)(British English)(North American English)(British English)(North American English)(British English)(British English)(British English)(North American English)(British English)(British English)

examples.text: The whole family has the flu.
She was off work for four days because of a bout with the flu.
